kitten.title: Household Readiness
items: Safe, kitten-proofed space (no loose wires/toxins).
Plan for spay/neuter if not already done.

kitten.title: Time Commitment
items: Able to socialize kitten (playtime, training).
Willing to provide lifetime care (15+ years).

kitten.title: Financial Responsibility
items: Budget for vaccinations, vet visits, and high-quality food.

adult-dog.title: Environment
items: Secure yard or commitment to leash walks 2 or 3 times a day.
No breed or size restrictions in your housing.

adult-dog.title: Routine & Training
items: Basic training or willingness to continue reinforcement.
Time for daily exercise and mental stimulation.

adult-dog.title: Long-Term Care
items: Commitment to vet visits, proper diet, and grooming.
Willingness to adapt to the dog's temperament or special needs.

adult-cat.title: Safe Space
items: Indoor space with scratching posts, litter box, and resting spots.
Windows or perches for enrichment.

adult-cat.title: Care Commitment
items: Regular feeding, litter box maintenance, and vet care.
Time for bonding and play, even for independent cats.

adult-cat.title: Long-Term Responsibility
items: Understanding of cat behavior and needs.
Willingness to provide care for 15+ years.

senior.title: Comfort Focus
items: Quiet home (no young kids/chaos if pet is frail).
Ramps/soft bedding if mobility issues.

senior.title: Health Commitment
items: Willingness to manage chronic conditions (arthritis, etc.).
Emergency vet fund or pet insurance.

senior.title: End-of-Life Care
items: Understanding their shorter timeline (love without regrets).
